moduslam.setup_manager.sensors_factory.factory module

class moduslam.setup_manager.sensors_factory.factory.SensorsFactory[source]

Bases: object

Creates and stores sensors.

classmethod get_sensors() → set[Sensor][source]

Gets all sensors.

classmethod get_sensor(name: str) → Sensor[source]

Gets sensor with the given name.

Parameters:

name – name of a sensor.

Returns:

sensor.

Raises:

ItemNotFoundError – if no sensor with the given name.

classmethod init_sensors(config: SensorFactoryConfig) → None[source]

Initializes sensors for the given configuration.

Parameters:

config – sensors` configuration.

static sensor_from_config(config: SensorConfig) → Sensor[source]

Creates sensor with the given configuration.

Parameters:

config – sensor configuration.

Returns:

sensor.

Raises:

ValueError – if sensor type is not supported.

moduslam.setup_manager.sensors_factory.sensors module

The module contains the base classes for sensors.

Use them to create new sensors if needed.

class moduslam.setup_manager.sensors_factory.sensors.Sensor(config: SensorConfig)[source]

Bases: object

Base class for any Sensor.

__Hash__(), __eq__() are overridden for hash ability purposes.

__init__(config: SensorConfig)[source]

Base sensor object.

Parameters:

config (SensorConfig) – sensor parameters.

property name: str

Name of the sensor.
